scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sarah
scrape.text: Really enjoyed "The Dinner," which had elements of the fabulous "Defending Jacob" by William Landay. The Dinner takes place over one single meal in which two brothers and their wives must decide how to deal with a horrific crime their children committed. Read this on vacation and was completely captivated from start to finish. Highly recommended if you are looking for a fast-paced story teeming with moral ambiguity.
